section.title: More examples of applets using CML
section.p:
A carbon-cation rearrangement reaction
<APPLET CODE="org.openscience.jmol.applet.JmolApplet" ARCHIVE="jmol-applet.jar,vecmath1.1-1.12.jar,cdk-cml.jar,gnujaxp-saxonly.jar" WIDTH="200" HEIGHT="200"> <PARAM NAME="model" VALUE="SN1_reaction.cml"/> </APPLET>

Rotamers of ethane
<APPLET CODE="org.openscience.jmol.applet.JmolApplet" ARCHIVE="jmol-applet.jar,vecmath1.1-1.12.jar,cdk-cml.jar,gnujaxp-saxonly.jar" WIDTH="200" HEIGHT="200"> <PARAM NAME="model" VALUE="conformeren.cml"/> </APPLET>

Caffeine in MDL mol file format
<APPLET CODE="org.openscience.jmol.applet.JmolApplet" ARCHIVE="jmol-applet.jar,vecmath1.1-1.12.jar" WIDTH="200" HEIGHT="200"> <PARAM NAME="model" VALUE="caffeine.mol"/> </APPLET>
